titleStmt.title: The declarations as vvell of the French King, as of the King of Nauarre Concerning the truce agreed vpon betwene their Maiesties: and touching the passage of the riuer of Loire.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1574-1589 : Henry III)
Henry III, King of France, 1551-1589.
Henry IV, King of France, 1553-1610.
Navarre (Kingdom). Sovereign (1572-1610 : Henry III). aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Field, dwelling in the black-Friers, neere Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: Henry III's declaration dated "Saulmur this 24. of April .. 1589"; Henry IV's "Saulmur, the eighteenth of Aprill, 1589".
Identified as STC 13095 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
